edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.large

Class BinaryStreamLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.large.BinaryLoader
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.large.BinaryStreamLoader

  • public class BinaryStreamLoader
extends BinaryLoader
    Language model that reads whole model into memory. Useful for loading language models from resources or external locations.
    Author:
    Nikolay Shmyrev

    • Method Detail

      • loadBuffer

        public byte[] loadBuffer(long position,
                         int size)
                  throws IOException
        Description copied from class: BinaryLoader
        Loads the contents of the memory-mapped file starting at the given position and for the given size, into a byte buffer. This method is implemented because MappedByteBuffer.load() does not work properly.
        Overrides:
        loadBuffer in class BinaryLoader
        Parameters:
        position - the starting position in the file
        size - the number of bytes to load
        Returns:
        the loaded ByteBuffer
        Throws:
        IOException
